## blockRendering.RenderInfo.getSpacerRowWidth\_() method

Calculate the width of a spacer row.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getSpacerRowWidth_(_prev: Row, _next: Row): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_prev | Row | The row before the spacer. |
|  \_next | Row | The row after the spacer.  The desired width of the spacer row between these two rows. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
